required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 2 Clinical Trial of MW33 Injection in Patients With COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Phase 2 Clinical Trial of MW33 Injection to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety in Patients With Mild or Moderate COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed as a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial to evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of MW33 injection in patients with mild or moderate COVID-19, and to evaluate its pharmacokinetic profile and immunogenicity.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Change in time-weighted SARS-CoV-2 viral load in nasopharyngeal swabs from baseline to day 7

intervention.description: a recombinant fully human antibody to coronavirus
